Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute at Madison/Oakley
ShortDescription: 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Western, Jackson, Damen, and Madison due to, street blockage near Madison/Oakley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Madison, Western, Jackson, Damen, and Madison due to, street blockage near Madison/Oakley.

Allow extra travel time.
